about_the_game:
You are a courier in the furniture delivery service.
Yesterday you drove a chair to Tomato Street, and today - a mirror on Lenin Avenue.
And again the car broke down - which means that all the daily earnings will go to repair.
The only thing that will brighten up these working days is music. Every week a single track is added to the radio in the rotation. What will be a hit in February? And in October?


A realistic courier simulator - every day is similar to the previous one. Routine. Only addresses and cargo for delivery differ. Everything, as in life.
Minimalistic text interface. Get a check-list with assignments for each day and execute them for income.
A random list of cases for each game day - a lot of combinations of subject-address, there will be almost no repetitions.
Music written by a neural network is a unique soundtrack for every game week. But you can choose manually in the settings you like the melody, and it will not interrupt during the game.

name: Delivery man simulator

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: xp, Vista, 7, 8, 8.1, 10
  • Processor: Intel atom 1.2 GHz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: windows 7 8 8.1 10
  • Processor: Intel Core I3
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Better then Intel HD Graphics
  • Storage: 150 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any

short_description: A realistic courier simulator with a minimal interface and music written by a neural network
